name: Dot (itch) (jasperaelvoet)
description:
NOTE: STEAM HAS TO BE RUNNING TO USE THE LEADERBOARD, BECAUSE SCORES WILL BE LINKED TO  YOUR STEAM ACCOUNT

Dot is a speed clicker strategic racing game!

You have to finish maps as fast as possible, but there is a catch. Before playing a map you have to strategically place objects like boosts etc. Depending on how quick you finish the map the more Dots you get. U can use these Dots to buy new levels or customize your Dot. There is also a world wide leaderboard, meaning that you can compete for the world record.

This game is my first "real" game. I have been working on it for over 6 months. It is still under development and I would like to hear whether you like it and what can improve. 

Controls:
- arrow keys to move dot and camera
- left mouse button to select and interact with GUI.
- right mouse button to delete placed objects.
